snippet.title: Hero of Sparta II - iPhone/iPod touch Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer until the end to finally know Hero of Sparta II release date!
All news and details on the official website: www.heroofsparta.com

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
